errors.noQrCode: No QR code found in image

education.subtitle: Why your password alone is like leaving your front door wide open
education.intro: Here's the thing about passwords: they're basically useless in 2024. Not because they're weak, but because everyone already has yours. Data breaches happen daily. Your 'secure' password is probably already for sale on the dark web for $0.50.

howItWorks.title: üîê How It Actually Works (Kid Version)
howItWorks.step1Desc: This is compromised. Accept it. Move on.
howItWorks.step2Desc: A 6-digit number that changes every 30 seconds based on:
howItWorks.mathDesc: HMAC-SHA1(Secret Key + Current Time) ‚Üí 6-digit code. Same inputs = same code. Different time = different code. Military-grade crypto in a pocket-sized package.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Even with your password, they need your phone/device generating codes. Can't steal what changes every 30 seconds.

protection.title: üõ°Ô∏è Real-World Protection
protection.phishingDesc: Click on fake login? Fine. Enter password? Still fine. They can't login without your rotating code (Google Security).
protection.stuffingDesc: Your leaked passwords from 47 different breaches? Useless without TOTP. Attacks up 71% in 2024 but you're immune (Sift Network).
protection.simDesc: SMS codes get hijacked. TOTP apps can't. FBI reports 183% increase in SIM swap attacks - doesn't matter with app-based 2FA.

science.title: üîí The Security Science
science.mathematicalProofDesc: TOTP codes are based on RFC 6238 (Google it). Same standard used by banks, governments, and literally every security-conscious organization.
science.cryptographicDesc: SHA-1 HMAC algorithm. Yes, SHA-1 has collision vulnerabilities for document signing. No, that doesn't matter here - you need the secret key, which never leaves your device.
science.timeBasedDesc: 30-second window = 17,280 different codes per day. Miss the window? Code's worthless. Good luck brute forcing that.
science.noNetworkDesc: Your phone generates codes offline. Air-gapped security without the hassle. Nothing to intercept. Nothing to man-in-the-middle.

privacy.title: ‚ö° Privacy: What Happens Here
privacy.clientSideDesc: Your Base32 secret never hits our servers. Can't hit our servers. We don't have servers for this. Everything's in your browser.
privacy.noTrackingDesc: No analytics. No cookies. No 'necessary for functionality' BS. Your codes are your business.
privacy.openSourceDesc: Don't trust us? Good. Audit the code yourself. It's all public. Fork it. Self-host it. We encourage paranoia.

bottomLine.title: üí° The Bottom Line (No BS)
bottomLine.reality: Reality check: If you're not using 2FA in 2024, you're not 'managing risk' - you're gambling. And the house always wins.
bottomLine.question: What's the excuse?

sources.title: Sources:
sources.description: Microsoft Security Report 2025, IBM Cost of a Data Breach Report 2024, Proofpoint Account Takeover Research 2024, AARP & Javelin Fraud Study 2024, Sift Global Network 2024, FBI IC3 Report 2024, Google Security Blog 2024

fields.secretHelp: Base32-encoded secret (usually provided by the service)

addAccountDialog.advancedSettings: Advanced settings: This implementation uses SHA-1 algorithm, 6 digits, and 30-second period by default. These are the most common settings.

securityInfo.title: Security Information
securityInfo.description: Your vault is encrypted with AES-256-GCM. All TOTP codes are generated locally in your browser. Click any code card to copy it to your clipboard. Remember to lock your vault when you're done.

backup.title: Backup & Restore
backup.warning: Restoring a backup will replace all current accounts in your vault. This action cannot be undone.
backup.dialogDescription: Export your vault or restore from a backup file
backup.importHelp: The backup file will be decrypted using your current master password. Make sure you're using the same password that was used to create the backup.

exportInfo.title: Export Information
exportInfo.description: Your backup file contains encrypted vault data. Keep it safe and secure.

requirementsList.samePassword: Created with the same master password

importSuccess.title: Backup restored
importSuccess.description: Your vault has been restored successfully

errors.invalidJson: Invalid backup file: not valid JSON

content.mainSubtitle: Understanding how this protects your digital life
content.intro: Let's be real - if you've got more than 3 online accounts, you need this. Here's why managing multiple 2FA codes without a proper system is like juggling chainsaws blindfolded. Possible, but really stupid.

securityScience.title: üîí The Security Science (Made Simple)
securityScience.intro: Your 6-digit codes come from military-grade mathematics. The same crypto that protects classified communications.
securityScience.aesDesc: Would take supercomputers billions of years to crack
securityScience.clientSideDesc: Zero server storage, zero data transmission, zero cloud risk

whyManager.title: ‚ö° Why This Manager Changes Everything
whyManager.feature1Desc: See ALL your codes simultaneously. Search instantly. Copy with one click. 10.5x faster than scrolling through apps.
whyManager.feature2Desc: Laptop dies? Restore in under 2 minutes. Compare that to calling support for 3-5 business days.
whyManager.feature3Desc: Everything runs in YOUR browser. Zero server storage. Zero cloud sync. We can't see your data because we don't have it.

threats.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Real Threats This Stops
threats.phishingDesc: 99% blocked even if you enter your password on fake sites (Google)

bottomLine.title: üí° The Bottom Line
bottomLine.description: You're choosing between spending 10 minutes now or spending 2+ weeks recovering from account takeover later.
